acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items came to the Library of Virginia in shipments of court papers from Fairfax County under the accession number 42347.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Thomas M. Davis was a member of the Fairfax County (Va.) Board of Supervisors as a representative from 1980 to 1990 and as chairperson from 1991-1994.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Correspondence of Thomas M. Davis - Board of Supervisors Chairperson, 1988-1994, includes correspondence from his time as represenative 1980 to 1990 and as Chairperson from 1991-1994.
